backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles and audio submissions with access control, offering queries and updates for profiles, artists, and audio metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level auth refactor requirements to source files and components with confidence and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and purpose of various frontend source files after the auth‑provider refactor.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md: Deployment checklist verifying provider hierarchy, source‑only changes, and end‑to‑end auth and navigation behavior post‑refactor.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode overrides for the app theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file rendering the root div and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Home page component rendering welcome text and the CreatorZoneTab.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface showing pending submissions, approved audio, and users with actions for approval and rejection.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneAuthC: Login/logout button component driven by AuthContext state.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneTab.t: Form UI for submitting audio metadata for admin approval with idle-logout notice handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenLoadin: Full‑screen loading indicator component with optional message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header providing navigation, user menu, admin routing logic, and identity-driven state handling.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Auth context managing Internet Identity login/logout, admin redirects, and idle auto‑logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing AuthClient lifecycle, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, admin checks, artist lists, and audio submission actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for light/dark modes and applies base background and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Studio.tsx: Admin-only Studio page that checks authentication and role before rendering the admin panel, showing loaders during redirects or profile fetches.
frontend/src/router.ts: Creates and exports the TanStack Router instance and registers its type.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the root layout and routes for the app, including the index and /studio routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, animations, and plugins with custom CSS variable-driven theming.
project_state.json: Project state metadata detailing auth provider issues, required fixes, and feature requests for adjusting provider hierarchy.
